data.title: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb
data.meta_description: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb PC at GameSpy - Check out the latest Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb cheats, cheat codes, walkthroughs, guides, videos and more!
data.text:
Poor

The man with the hat deserves a better PC game than this. Read Review

Join daring archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones as he travels to 1935 China to prevent a powerful artifact from falling into evil hands. Indy's latest globe-spanning adventure takes you from the jungles of Ceylon and underwater palaces in Istanbul, to the deadly streets of Hong Kong and beyond. Racing against evil Nazis and the Asian underworld with mysterious, alluring partner Mei Ying, you'll leap, swim, climb and punch your way through exotic locales, fighting hand-to- hand combat from street brawls to martial arts battles. It will take more than just your trusty whip and pistol to avoid deadly traps and navigate through all the dangerous environments. Do you have what it takes to possess the mysterious "Heart of the Dragon?"

Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb

Let's face it. In my pantheon of "cool," Indiana Jones is right up there with Darth Vader, Optimus Prime, and the guy who invented buffalo wings. The fedora-wearing, whip-wielding Nazi smashing archaeologist/adventurer ripped up the screen in three swashbuckling adventures that warped my fragile young psyche only slightly less than Star Wars. Even better, as the quintessential action hero who's been the inspiration for video game characters ranging from Pitfall Harry to Lara Croft, Indy always seemed like he'd be tailor-made for video game superstardom. Read More »

Rick Watters on Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb

Taking a break after just completing work on Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb, The Collective's Rick Watters talks Indiana Jones, licensing big-name properties, and what's next for the company. Read More »
